definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

(category defined by the Communist Party) poor and lower-middle peasants: farmers who, before land reform, possessed little or no land (poor peasants) and those who were barely able to support themselves with their own land (lower-middle peasants)

sentences.english: It was not until the second period, when the peasant associations were already exercising great power, that the middle peasants came in.
sentences.chinese: 一直到第二时期，农会势力大盛，中农方加入农会。

sentences.english: Chapter 2, status and problems of land conversion in China's urbanization.
sentences.chinese: 第2章，我国城市化进程中农地非农化的现状和问题。

sentences.english: The term " peasantry" refers mainly to the poor and middle peasants.
sentences.chinese: 农民这个名称所包括的内容，主要地是指贫农和中农。

sentences.english: They classed as poor and lower-middle peasants at the time of the land reform.
sentences.chinese: 土地改革时他们被划为贫下中农。

sentences.english: This forward role consisted in forging unity with the middle peasants for common action.
sentences.chinese: 这种带头作用即是团结中农和自己一道行动。

sentences.english: We must avoid adopting any adventurist policies towards the middle peasants.
sentences.chinese: 必须避免对中农采取任何冒险政策。

sentences.english: Then a representative of the poor and lower middle class peasants would give us a report, telling of his miserable life before liberation.
sentences.chinese: 请来贫下中农的代表作报告，诉说解放前的苦难生活。

sentences.english: The research is a part of the English Learning Program sponsored by Academic Affairs Office of Huazhong Agricultural University.
sentences.chinese: 此项研究是华中农业大学教务处资助项目的一部分。

sentences.english: The well-to-do middle peasants also changed their tune.
sentences.chinese: 富裕中农也改变了腔调。

sentences.english: Farmers involved in the formation in April 2004, Shengda Technology Limited.
sentences.chinese: 2004年4月参与组建北京中农盛达科技有限公司。

definition: rich peasant/social class of people farming their own land, intermediate between land-owner class 地主[di4 zhu3] and poor peasant 貧農|贫农[pin2 nong2]
our peasant friends (political term used in the early years of the Old Democratic Revolution, 1840-1919)/(Tw) (coll.) farmer
cooperative/workers' or agricultural producers' cooperative etc
a rich farmer/to stress the importance of agriculture (in ancient philosophy)
Huinong district of Shizuishan city 石嘴山市[Shi2 zui3 shan1 shi4], Ningxia

pinyin: Xi1 bei3 Nong2 lin2 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2
